name: 楊元森
objective:
這是大學部學生的第二門程式語言課程，將銜接基礎程式設計，並準備學生進入FIT-2。 本課程將以C/C++授控制敘述、函數、陣列、向量、字串、工程實務範例等課題。（學校規定之專業必修課程）

因應防疫，若有發燒狀況，請自行居家休養，採用遠距教學。
schedule:
Current progress:
Week 1: Introduction to Programming 
Week 2: Fast typing for programming 
Week 3: Branch and search functions in spreadsheets 
Week 4: Programming branch in macro 
Week 5: Branch exercise (i): Guess numbers. Shopping discount. 
Week 6: Branch exercise (ii): Multi-level branching
Week 7: Loop in macro
Week 8: Array in macro
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Data types of integers and floating-point reals
Week 11: Scopes, branching, and operators
Week 12: While loop and password exercise
Week 13: For loop and exercises (sum, avg, std, eclipse perimeter) 
Week 14: Multi-layer for-loop and exercises
Week 15: Array and bubble sort
Week 16: Array, multi-loop, branching combined
Week 17: Final simulation
Week 18: Final examination
scorePolicy:
Assignment, interaction in class, note taken: 30% +/- 10%
Midterm: 30% +/- 10%
Final: 40% +/- 10%
materials: Lecturer's note and selected online material
